name: shadow-risc0-prover
description: RISC Zero proving pipeline for Shadow

scripts.prove: PATH="$HOME/.risc0/bin:$PATH" cargo run --release -p shadow-risc0-host -- prove --input inputs/shadow/default.json
scripts.inspect: PATH="$HOME/.risc0/bin:$PATH" cargo run --release -p shadow-risc0-host -- inspect --input inputs/shadow/default.json
